Text: SEC VaRtold Eugenio about another Enron stock swap This one is very large with an exposure to million shares though it is a little hedged by the Phantom swap As a result the VaR for nontrading securities increased from an average to million We also recalculated Merchant Asset VaR Regards Adarsh and Eugenio
